articles.title: "Void and vacant": Trump says Biden pardons are nullified
articles.description: Donald Trump said the former president's pardons of representatives who investigated Jan. 6 were nullified.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump, drop this petty push to void Joe Biden's pardons
articles.description: President Trump posted on TruthSocial that the pardons for all nine members of the Jan. 6 Committee, including then-Rep. Liz Cheney, were "hereby declared VOID, VACANT, AND OF NO FURTHER FORCE OR EFFECT, because of the fact that they were done by Autopen."
articles.content:
